statements: CREATE TABLE {{SCHEMA_NAME}}.MODERATION_LOG (ID BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY,VERSION BIGINT NOT NULL,CREATED_AT TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,CREATED_BY BIGINT NOT NULL,EDITED_AT TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NULL,EDITED_BY TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NULL,LINE_TYPE INT NOT NULL,MODERATOR_ID BIGINT NOT NULL,USER_ID BIGINT NOT NULL,REASON VARCHAR(1024) NOT NULL,DURATION BIGINT DEFAULT NULL,CHANNEL TEXT DEFAULT NULL)
